thought: I am trying to craft a lantern. First I will need to craft a stick and a torch. I have bamboo available so I will start by moving that to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 4 with quantity 1
